Posts.Content: Anybody stage 1 not in nodes and estrogen and HER2 positive?
Posts.Title: Breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thank you for the information. I did stop taking tamoxiphen the side effects were to much.
Posts.Title: Breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hello, I am currently taking tamoxifen actually just started in December 2013. I have awful side effects like constipation, hot flashes, night sweats and tiredness. I am miserable and not sure if I should continue. I was diagnosed as a stage 1 not in nodes but all 3 positives. Any advice would be great.
Posts.Title: Not sure if I want to continue tamoxifen

Posts.Content: Thanks for your reply. I also had bad side effects with the tamoxiphen. My dr isn't happy that I wanted to stop taking it and won't even try the other one. I'm stage 1 and not in lymph nodes but her2 positive and estrogen positive. Good luck to you
Posts.Title: Not sure if I want to continue tamoxifen

Posts.Content: I am stage 1 not in lymph nodes and all 3 positives too. I just stopped taking it I had the same side effects you did. I went to a Amish dr he put me on myomin he said it does the same thing but its all natural.
Posts.Title: Not sure if I want to continue tamoxifen

Posts.Content: Have you tried arnica? It's a natural oil used for pain just rub on where your pain is. It's wonderful. That might help too.
Posts.Title: mastectomy pain?

Posts.Content: I had a double mastectomy and I started going to a massage therapist within 3 months of surgery. This has really helped out with my pain and range of motion in my arm and shoulders. You could also have a physical therapist wok itch you for better range of motion. Hope you find one relief.
Posts.Title: mastectomy pain?
